description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(230).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,182,0,-1).
formula: G.f.: -(x^2-6*x-1) / (x^4-182*x^2+1). - _Colin Barker_, Nov 17 2013a(n) = 182*a(n-2) - a(n-4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 17 2013
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1,6,181,1092]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 182*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..100]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 17 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
